Translations.Text: Dhalika Al-Kitabu La Rayba Fihi Hudaan Lilmuttaqina
Al-Ladhina Yu'uminuna Bil-Ghaybi Wa Yuqimuna As-Salaata Wa Mimma Razaqnahum Yunfiquna
Wa Al-Ladhina Yu'uminuna Bima 'Unzila 'Ilayka Wa Ma 'Unzila Min Qablika Wa Bil-'Akhirati Hum Yuqinuna
Ula'ika `Ala Hudaan Min Rabbihim Wa 'Ula'ika Humu Al-Muflihuna
